text: Act Against Bullying (AAB) is a national charity in the United Kingdom.Ward, Lucy Ward (2005-05-17). "Losing the plot," The Guardian, 17 May 2005; retrieved 2013-2-19. The purpose of the organization is to help children who are bullied at school. ==History== AAB was founded in 2003.
